segments.text: Good morning , Mr . Montgomery . I've been sent over from purchasing to fill in for Clare Williams .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , really ? Nice to meet you . I thought they were going to leave me here on my own ! How long have you been with the company ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , about seven years . Time flies , you know !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Does it ever ! Well , let's get started . If you could begin typing this letter now , I'll see what else needs to be done .
segments.speaker: S2
